casebody.data:
Robert E. Sweigart as Shareholder of William Sweigart & Sons Sanitation Service Inc., Robert E. Sweigart, Susan Desimone, Co executors of Estate of William Sweigart
v.
Violet F. Sweigart, a/k/a Violet Ruth Sweigart, a/k/a Violet Sweigart, William K. Sweigart, William Sweigart & Sons Sanitation Service, Inc., Bill Sweigart Waste Water Inc. NO. 1 MAL 2016 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania May 17, 2016 Appeal from the Superior Court.

Disposition: Denied.
